active_users_desc: Time in seconds to consider a user active
sync_frequency_desc: Frequency in seconds to sync the database
repearter_lat/lon_desc: Latitude and Longitude for the repeater
broadcast_message: Welcome to Jönköping! This is an experimental beacon.  For more information visit https://jkpg-mesh.github.io/ or type /info

emergancy_freq_desc: Frequency in seconds to broadcast the emergency message
